Text.Page:
We're going through bandanges like mad around here, and are short on materials to make more. Happen to have any sylva thread handy?

No? Will you get me some? Gather it from those brown, knobby plants near here. Just don't eat the mushrooms, I hear they make you see things.
This is a great help! Here's a little something for you.
Did I mention we're running out of bandages?
